biotools.summary: Creation of a HTML report of differential expression analyses of count data. It integrates some of the code mentioned in DESeq2 and edgeR vignettes, and report a ranked list of genes according to the fold changes mean and variability for each selected gene.

bioschemas.name: DEGreport
